content: Hi Guys and Gals, Just a question. In chasing the American dream I started a company of my own. I was/ am an auto broker and got into it because of the way I saw clients treated. As we all know the auto industry has faultered quite a bite and has taken it's toll on my company. In fact, I tried to hang on as long as I could but I had to shut the company down. Because we struggled for such a long time I couldn't afford to pay into unemployment. Now that has me on the brink of homelessness. My question is, is there any compensation or benefits for situations like this or am I sol? Please, any advice is highly appreciated.
reply: Hi Guys and Gals, Just a question. In chasing the American dream I started a company of my own. I was/ am an auto broker and got into it because of the way I saw clients treated. As we all know the auto industry has faultered quite a bite and has taken it's toll on my company. In fact, I tried to hang on as long as I could but I had to shut the company down. Because we struggled for such a long time I couldn't afford to pay into unemployment. Now that has me on the brink of homelessness. My question is, is there any compensation or benefits for situations like this or am I sol? Please, any advice is highly appreciated.
title: Compensation

content: Well you already spelled it out..... nobody "owes" you anything so as I see it, and I was once in this position, you can roll over and die or stand up and drive on.... pure, simple, cold and hard, but it is what it is. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE
reply: Well you already spelled it out..... nobody "owes" you anything so as I see it, and I was once in this position, you can roll over and die or stand up and drive on.... pure, simple, cold and hard, but it is what it is. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE
title: Compensation

content: quote: My question is, is there any compensation or benefits for situations like this or am I sol? What ya don't pay into, in order to keep the money, you sure don't have a claim on later, unless you're Freddie Mac, Fannie Mae, AIG, Chrysler, or GM . . . Best try Obama for a bail-out. If you can make yourself sound large enough, maybe he'll throw you some more of my unborn great grandkids' cash - - Wandering and Wondering
quote: My question is, is there any compensation or benefits for situations like this or am I sol?

content: At the risk of sounding rude, in times like these you have to pick yourself up, dust yourself off. Go in another direction. BTW, most important...believe in yourself! Don't let negative thoughts get you down! Good luck! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!

content: You might shift from cars to tents. A lot of people are going to be needing one - - Wandering and Wondering
